forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 52F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 63F. Winds light and variable.
